desc: The Original Quickfire US is the world wide leader in fire starters for fire place, wood burning stove, BBQ grills, fire pits, campfires, outdoors man, survivalist and the weekend worriers alike. Get a bag of Quickfire today and see why we can say it lights the first time, every time.

layout.text: QuickFire provides a 10 - 15 inch flame that burns at 750 degrees for up to ten minutes. This reliable flame allows you to start a fire when others fail.
